items.name: Spinach Artichoke Dip
items.description: Creamy spinach and artichoke dip served with tortilla chips.

items.name: Chicken Wings
items.description: Crispy chicken wings with your choice of sauce: BBQ, Buffalo, or Teriyaki.

items.name: Mozzarella Sticks
items.description: Golden-fried mozzarella sticks served with marinara sauce.

items.name: Loaded Nachos
items.description: Tortilla chips topped with melted cheese, black beans, jalapenos, tomatoes, and sour cream.

items.name: Fried Calamari
items.description: Crispy fried calamari rings served with lemon aioli dipping sauce.

items.name: Caprese Skewers
items.description: Fresh mozzarella, cherry tomatoes, and basil drizzled with balsamic glaze.

items.name: Caesar Salad
items.description: Crisp romaine lettuce, Parmesan cheese, croutons, and Caesar dressing.

items.name: Greek Salad
items.description: Mixed greens, cucumbers, tomatoes, Kalamata olives, red onions, feta cheese, and Greek dressing.

items.name: Cobb Salad
items.description: Mixed greens, grilled chicken, bacon, avocado, hard-boiled eggs, tomatoes, and blue cheese dressing.

items.name: Asian Sesame Salad
items.description: Mixed greens, grilled chicken, mandarin oranges, toasted almonds, crispy noodles, and sesame ginger dressing.

items.name: Caprese Salad
items.description: Fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, basil, and balsamic glaze.

items.name: Spinach Berry Salad
items.description: Baby spinach, strawberries, blueberries, goat cheese, candied pecans, and balsamic vinaigrette.

items.name: Margherita Pizza
items.description: Fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, basil, and olive oil.

items.name: Pepperoni Pizza
items.description: Classic pepperoni pizza with mozzarella cheese and tomato sauce.

items.name: Vegetarian Pizza
items.description: Assorted vegetables, mozzarella cheese, and tomato sauce.

items.name: BBQ Chicken Pizza
items.description: Grilled chicken, red onions, BBQ sauce, mozzarella cheese, and cilantro.

items.name: Meat Lovers Pizza
items.description: Pepperoni, sausage, bacon, ham, mozzarella cheese, and tomato sauce.

items.name: Supreme Pizza
items.description: Pepperoni, sausage, mushrooms, bell peppers, onions, black olives, mozzarella cheese, and tomato sauce.

items.name: Spaghetti Bolognese
items.description: Spaghetti pasta with homemade meat sauce.

items.name: Fettuccine Alfredo
items.description: Fettuccine pasta tossed in creamy Alfredo sauce.

items.name: Chicken Parmesan
items.description: Breaded chicken breast topped with marinara sauce and melted mozzarella cheese, served with spaghetti.

items.name: Shrimp Scampi
items.description: Sautéed shrimp in garlic butter sauce served over linguine pasta.

items.name: Penne Arrabiata
items.description: Penne pasta tossed in spicy tomato sauce with garlic and red pepper flakes.

items.name: Eggplant Parmesan
items.description: Breaded eggplant slices topped with marinara sauce and melted mozzarella cheese, served with spaghetti.

items.name: New York Cheesecake
items.description: Classic New York-style cheesecake topped with strawberry sauce.

items.name: Chocolate Lava Cake
items.description: Warm chocolate cake with a gooey chocolate center, served with vanilla ice cream.

items.name: Tiramisu
items.description: Layered coffee-soaked ladyfingers and mascarpone cream, dusted with cocoa powder.

items.name: Apple Pie
items.description: Classic apple pie with a flaky crust, served with vanilla ice cream.

items.description: Rich custard topped with caramelized sugar.

items.name: Berry Tart
items.description: Buttery tart crust filled with mixed berries and pastry cream.
